title: Let’s Start an Inn on the Dungeon Island! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Mature   Romance
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Androgynous Characters   Charming Protagonist   Cowardly Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Naive Protagonist   Transported to Another World
author: Nagano Bunzaburou   長野文三郎
description:
The timid main character (male) is sent to a different world where only women can use magic.

He’s not good at fighting, but he will develop a deserted island with the given creative magic!>
